definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: We need a strong farm hand.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要一个强壮的田间能手。

sentences.english: But smart-phones and internet-connected television sets have changed that.
sentences.chinese: 但是智能手机和网络电视机改变了人们这一想法。

sentences.english: Other handset makers are also looking to tap the market for low-priced smartphones.
sentences.chinese: 其他手机生产商也在寻求进入廉价智能手机市场。

sentences.english: And non-Apple smartphone prices continue to fall.
sentences.chinese: 非苹果品牌的智能手机价格继续下跌。

sentences.english: In the area of WAP, smart phones are meant to be the winner of terminals.
sentences.chinese: 无线互联时代，智能手机注定成为新的终端王者。

sentences.english: The makers of navigation devices have not ignored the spread of smartphones.
sentences.chinese: 导航设备制造商们并没有忽略向智能手机的延伸。

sentences.english: Essentially, then, RIM is making hay in the lower-end of the smartphone market.
sentences.chinese: 基本上RIM是在低端智能手机市场抓住机会。

sentences.english: Today's smart phones have multiple layers of defense.
sentences.chinese: 现在的智能手机都具有多层防御。

sentences.english: Successful people are masters at problem solving.
sentences.chinese: 成功的人士在解决问题上是能手。

sentences.english: I should be given a smartphone.
sentences.chinese: 我应该得到一部智能手机。

sentences.english: Cloud-based mobile apps can scale far beyond the capabilities of any smartphone.
sentences.chinese: 云计算手机软件的升级能力远远超过所有智能手机。

sentences.english: Leaving smartphones I-don’t-know-where happens all the time.
sentences.chinese: 把智能手机丢在任何地方都有可能。

sentences.english: The super-smart-phone war is still in its early stages.
sentences.chinese: 超智能手机的战争仍然处于初期阶段。

sentences.english: Together, the phone and probe weigh about 13 ounces.
sentences.chinese: 智能手机和探头总共重量约为13盎司左右。

sentences.english: Wulin through stories, a dragon 18 zhangs variation unsummon resection.
sentences.chinese: 武林能手的穿越故事，降龙十八掌变异为呼唤术。

sentences.english: The iPhone remains the best-selling smartphone.
sentences.chinese: 此款iPhone一直是最畅销的智能手机。

definition: to have a skill/to have a lot on the ball/to have an affair
family firm producing a special product/cottage industry
parade guards (usually spaced out along parade routes)/example/model/pacesetter
to be adept at sth/to be an expert in a trade or profession
experienced person/an old hand at sth
